Welcome to Masahito Hayashi's reserach group. We focus on many research areas in the Quantum Information Theory, ranging from quantum statistics to quantum Shannon theory, quantum network coding, verification of quantum computation, entanglement theory, quantum measurement theory, and quantum thermodynamics.
